title: Has there been any recent news on the Solo Queue?
body: Haven't played ranked yet as waiting for solo queue, and was just wondering if there had been any news yet.

replies.body:
I'm not sure what you are looking for as the 2016 Season is well and truly underway.

If you are looking for the 'Solo/Duo Queue' in Season 5 and previous seasons, it has been replaced with a Dynamic Ranked Queue where you can queue with up to 5 people in ranked. Not ranked teams, ranked.

So you can still Solo Queue like before, just that they added options.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback

They have plans to add a pure solo queue (no duo) in the coming time after dynamic was added.
No specific timetable yet, only that it's soon. My guess would be late Feb/early March, but it'll basically be however long it takes them to get it working.
I still agree with a lot of people saying Riot is purposely avoiding putting too much effort into solo queue at the moment so more people try dynamic.

Perhaps, but it's unlikely. More likely they thought that dynamic would remove the need for it, and I think for the most part they are right, but there are people who have grown accustomed to and prefer the less team oriented experience of true solo queue. It is more likely they were simply not prepared to create a solo queue to work with the new system and so it's taking them a bit to get it together.
Probably, the other theory was just me with my tin foil hat tightened.
Only a hat? M8 you gotta step up your game. Make a majestic ass ball gown outta that.

Oh ok thanks.

EDIT: Removing Ranked Teams doesn't make much sense.
I'm hoping it comes soon. Ranked is just painful and frustrating if you don't play with friends/a team.

One of the things I've hated even about duo queue is that you have people in voice comms that can plan their attack well and co-operate on an unfair level. Solo queue however is something that will test the players pure skill.
